thread.title: Expatriate Arrested In Lagos For Disobeying Traffic Light, Using Illegal Siren
thread.title_full: Expatriate Arrested In Lagos For Disobeying Traffic Light, Using Illegal Siren

author: Jo Daniel
title: Expatriate Arrested In Lagos For Disobeying Traffic Light, Using Illegal Siren
text:
Jo Daniel February 28, 2017 
An expatriate has been arrested by officers of the Lagos state police command, for breaking traffic laws of the State. 
The Mantra protection solution boss, who was in a black Toyota jeep while being escorted to work with a white hilux van, was arrested for disobeying the traffic light and also using the siren illegally. Heâ€™s now cooling off in the police station. Recommended for you
